scripts.build-prod: npm run shell-build-prod && npm run menu-build-prod && npm run occupation-build-prod && npm run personnel-build-prod
scripts.build-dev: npm run shell-build-dev && npm run menu-build-dev && npm run occupation-build-dev && npm run personnel-build-dev
scripts.start-prod: concurrently --kill-others --names "SHELL,MENU,OCCUPATION,PERSONNEL" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgRed.bold,bgCyan.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run shell-start-prod" "npm run menu-start-prod" "npm run occupation-start-prod" "npm run personnel-start-prod"
scripts.start-dev: concurrently --kill-others --names "SHELL,MENU,OCCUPATION,PERSONNEL" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgRed.bold,bgCyan.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run shell-start-dev" "npm run menu-start-dev" "npm run occupation-start-dev" "npm run personnel-start-dev"
scripts.watch: concurrently --kill-others --names "SHELL,MENU,OCCUPATION,PERSONNEL" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgRed.bold,bgCyan.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run shell-watch" "npm run menu-watch" "npm run occupation-watch" "npm run personnel-watch"
scripts.start: npm run backend-start && npm run start-prod
